trans-unit.target: Per qualsiasi voce che si verifica un errore di verifica, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> imposta relativo <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> proprietà `False`.

trans-unit.source: An application cannot select a voice whose <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> property is `False`.
trans-unit.target: Un'applicazione non è possibile selezionare una voce il cui <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> proprietà `False`.

trans-unit.source: Typically, applications will not set a voice’s <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: In genere, le applicazioni non verranno impostata una voce <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: To select a voice based on other characteristics, see the other <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> overloads.
trans-unit.target: Per selezionare una voce in base alle altre caratteristiche, vedere l'altro <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> overload.

trans-unit.source: To select a voice by name, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Per selezionare una voce del nome, utilizzare il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: The stream to which to append synthesis output.
trans-unit.target: Flusso in cui aggiungere l'output di sintesi.

trans-unit.source: The format to use for the synthesis output.
trans-unit.target: Il formato da utilizzare per l'output di sintesi.

trans-unit.source: Configures the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> object to append output to an audio stream.
trans-unit.target: Configura l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> per aggiungere l'output a un flusso audio.

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A> to release the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>’s reference to the stream.
trans-unit.target: Chiamare <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A> per rilasciare il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>del riferimento al flusso.

trans-unit.source: For other output configuration options, see the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveFile%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveStream%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Per altre opzioni di configurazione di output, vedere il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveFile%2A>, e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveStream%2A> metodi.

trans-unit.source: Configures the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> object to send output to the default audio device.
trans-unit.target: Configura l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> per inviare l'output al dispositivo audio predefinito.

trans-unit.source: You can use the **Sound** window in the Windows **Control Panel** to configure the default audio device for the computer.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare il **suono** finestra nelle finestre **Pannello di controllo** per configurare il dispositivo audio predefinito per il computer.

trans-unit.source: For other output configuration options, see the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToAudioStream%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveFile%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveStream%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Per altre opzioni di configurazione di output, vedere il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToAudioStream%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveFile%2A>, e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveStream%2A> metodi.

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the synthesizer to speak a phrase to the default audio output.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente usa il sintetizzatore per parlare di una frase all'output audio predefinito.

trans-unit.source: Configures the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> object to not send output from synthesis operations to a device, file, or stream.
trans-unit.target: Configura l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> per non inviare l'output dalle operazioni di sintesi di un dispositivo, file o flusso.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to release the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> ‘s reference to a file or stream.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo metodo per rilasciare il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> del riferimento a un file o flusso.

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveStream%2A> for an example.
trans-unit.target: Per un esempio, vedere <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveStream%2A>.

trans-unit.source: For other output configuration options, see the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToAudioStream%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveFile%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveStream%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Per altre opzioni di configurazione di output, vedere il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToAudioStream%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveFile%2A>, e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveStream%2A> metodi.

trans-unit.source: Configures the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> object to append output to a Waveform audio format file.
trans-unit.target: Configura l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> per aggiungere l'output a un file in formato audio Waveform.

trans-unit.source: To release the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>’s reference to the file, reconfigure the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>’s output, for example, by calling <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Per rilasciare il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>del riferimento al file, riconfigurare il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>dell'output, ad esempio, chiamando <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A>.

trans-unit.source: For other output configuration options, see the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToAudioStream%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveStream%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Per altre opzioni di configurazione di output, vedere il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToAudioStream%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A>, e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveStream%2A> metodi.

trans-unit.source: The path to the file.
trans-unit.target: Percorso del file.

trans-unit.source: Configures the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> object to append output to a file that contains Waveform format audio.
trans-unit.target: Configura l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> per aggiungere l'output a un file che contiene l'audio in formato Waveform.

trans-unit.source: To configure the output and specify the audio format, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveFile%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Per configurare l'output e specificare il formato audio, utilizzare il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveFile%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: The following example uses an instance of <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer> to play a prompt that has been output to a .wav file.
trans-unit.target: L'esempio seguente usa un'istanza di <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer> per riprodurre un prompt dei comandi di output a un file. wav.

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> call is asynchronous, the <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer> instance is created (and the <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.Play%2A> method invoked) in the handler for the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: Poiché il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> chiamata è asincrona, il <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer> viene creata l'istanza (e <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.Play%2A> metodo richiamato) nel gestore per il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted> evento.

trans-unit.source: The path to the file.
trans-unit.target: Percorso del file.

trans-unit.source: The audio format information.
trans-unit.target: Informazioni sul formato audio.

trans-unit.source: Configures the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> object to append output to a Waveform audio format file in a specified format.
trans-unit.target: Configura l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> per aggiungere l'output a un file in formato audio Waveform in un formato specificato.

trans-unit.source: The following example specifies the format of the output of speech synthesis and sends it to a WAV file.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente specifica il formato dell'output di sintesi vocale e lo invia a un file WAV.

trans-unit.source: The stream to which to append synthesis output.
trans-unit.target: Flusso in cui aggiungere l'output di sintesi.

trans-unit.source: Configures the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> object to append output to a stream that contains Waveform format audio.
trans-unit.target: Configura l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> per aggiungere l'output a un flusso che contiene l'audio in formato Waveform.

trans-unit.source: To release the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>’s reference to the stream, reconfigure the synthesizer's output, for example, by calling <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Per rilasciare il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>del riferimento per il flusso, reconfigure al sintetizzatore l'output, ad esempio, chiamando <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A>.

trans-unit.source: For other output configuration options, see the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToAudioStream%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveFile%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Per altre opzioni di configurazione di output, vedere il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToAudioStream%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A>, e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveFile%2A> metodi.

trans-unit.source: The following example outputs a phrase to a WAV stream.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente restituisce un'espressione in un flusso WAV.

trans-unit.source: Generates speech output synchronously from a string, a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt" /> object, or a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Genera l'output vocale in modo sincrono da una stringa, un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt" /> o un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> methods generate speech synchronously.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> metodi generano il riconoscimento vocale in modo sincrono.

trans-unit.source: The methods do not return until the content of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> instance has been completely spoken.
trans-unit.target: I metodi non restituiscono fino a quando il contenuto del <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> istanza è stato completamente letto.

trans-unit.source: This is the simplest way to generate speech.
trans-unit.target: Questo è il modo più semplice per generare il riconoscimento vocale.

trans-unit.source: However, if your application needs to perform tasks while speaking, for example highlight text, paint animation, monitor controls, or other tasks, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> methods or the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> method to generate speech asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, se l'applicazione deve eseguire l'attività mentre si parla, ad esempio evidenziare il testo, l'animazione di disegno, i controlli di monitoraggio o altre attività, utilizzare il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> metodi o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> metodo per generare il riconoscimento vocale in modo asincrono.

trans-unit.source: During a call to this method, the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> can raise the following events:
trans-unit.target: Durante una chiamata a questo metodo, il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> può generare gli eventi seguenti:

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged>.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the speaking state of the synthesizer changes.
trans-unit.target: Generato quando cambia lo stato del sintetizzatore pronuncia.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the synthesizer begins generating speech.
trans-unit.target: Generato quando il sintetizzatore inizia la generazione di riconoscimento vocale.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>.

trans-unit.source: Raised each time the synthesizer reaches a letter or combination of letters that constitute a discreet sound of speech in a language.
trans-unit.target: Generato ogni volta che il sintetizzatore raggiunge una lettera o una combinazione di lettere che costituiscono un suono separato della voce in una lingua.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress>.

trans-unit.source: Raised each time the synthesizer completes speaking a word.
trans-unit.target: Generato ogni volta che il sintetizzatore completa parlare di una parola.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached>.

trans-unit.source: Raised each time spoken output requires a change in the position of the mouth or the facial muscles used to produce speech.
trans-unit.target: Generato ogni volta che l'output vocale richiede una modifica nella posizione di bocca o muscoli facciale utilizzati per produrre vocale.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the synthesizer encounters a bookmark in a prompt.
trans-unit.target: Generato quando il sintetizzatore rileva un segnalibro in un prompt dei comandi.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange>.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the speaking voice for the synthesizer changes.
trans-unit.target: Generato quando la voce per il sintetizzatore cambia.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> does not raise the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted> event while processing any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> non genera il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted> eventi durante l'elaborazione di uno qualsiasi del <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> metodi.

trans-unit.source: The content to speak.
trans-unit.target: Il contenuto da leggere a voce.

trans-unit.source: Synchronously speaks the contents of a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt" /> object.
trans-unit.target: In modo sincrono sul contenuto di un oggetto di <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt" />.

trans-unit.source: To asynchronously speak the contents of a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> object, use <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Fare in modo asincrono il contenuto di un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> oggetto, usare <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> object from a string and passes the object as an argument to the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene creato un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> oggetto da una stringa e l'oggetto passato come argomento per il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> (metodo).

trans-unit.source: The content to speak.
trans-unit.target: Il contenuto da leggere a voce.

trans-unit.source: Synchronously speaks the contents of a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder" /> object.
trans-unit.target: In modo sincrono sul contenuto di un oggetto di <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder" />.

trans-unit.source: To asynchronously speak the contents of a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> object, use <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Fare in modo asincrono il contenuto di un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> oggetto, usare <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> object from a string and passes the object as an argument to the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene creato un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> oggetto da una stringa e l'oggetto passato come argomento per il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> (metodo).

trans-unit.source: The text to speak.
trans-unit.target: Testo da leggere a voce.

trans-unit.source: Synchronously speaks the contents of a string.
trans-unit.target: In modo sincrono legge il contenuto di una stringa.

trans-unit.source: To synchronously speak a string that contains SSML markup, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Per parlare in modo sincrono una stringa contenente markup SSML, utilizzare il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: To asynchronously speak the contents of a string, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Per leggere in modo asincrono il contenuto di una stringa, utilizzare il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: As shown in the following example, the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> method provides the simplest means to generate speech output synchronously.
trans-unit.target: Come illustrato nell'esempio seguente, il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> metodo fornisce i mezzi più semplici per generare il riconoscimento vocale output in modo sincrono.

trans-unit.source: Generates speech output asynchronously from a string, a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt" /> object, or a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Genera l'output vocale in modo asincrono da una stringa, un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt" /> o un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> methods generate speech asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> metodi generano in modo asincrono il riconoscimento vocale.

trans-unit.source: The methods return immediately without waiting for the content of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> object to finish speaking.
trans-unit.target: I metodi restituiscono immediatamente senza attendere che il contenuto del <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> oggetto generale.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> if your application needs to perform tasks while speaking, for example highlight text, paint animation, monitor controls, or other tasks.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> se l'applicazione deve eseguire attività mentre si parla, evidenziare il testo, ad esempio, disegnare animazione, i controlli di monitoraggio o altre attività.

trans-unit.source: During a call to this method, the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> can raise the following events:
trans-unit.target: Durante una chiamata a questo metodo, il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> può generare gli eventi seguenti:

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged>.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the speaking state of the synthesizer changes.
trans-unit.target: Generato quando cambia lo stato del sintetizzatore pronuncia.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the synthesizer begins generating speech.
trans-unit.target: Generato quando il sintetizzatore inizia la generazione di riconoscimento vocale.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>.

trans-unit.source: Raised each time the synthesizer reaches a letter or combination of letters that constitute a discreet sound of speech in a language.
trans-unit.target: Generato ogni volta che il sintetizzatore raggiunge una lettera o una combinazione di lettere che costituiscono un suono separato della voce in una lingua.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress>.

trans-unit.source: Raised each time the synthesizer completes speaking a word.
trans-unit.target: Generato ogni volta che il sintetizzatore completa parlare di una parola.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached>.

trans-unit.source: Raised each time spoken output requires a change in the position of the mouth or the facial muscles used to produce speech.
trans-unit.target: Generato ogni volta che l'output vocale richiede una modifica nella posizione di bocca o muscoli facciale utilizzati per produrre vocale.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the synthesizer encounters a bookmark in a prompt.
trans-unit.target: Generato quando il sintetizzatore rileva un segnalibro in un prompt dei comandi.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange>.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the speaking voice for the synthesizer changes.
trans-unit.target: Generato quando la voce per il sintetizzatore cambia.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted>.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the synthesizer finishes a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> operation.
trans-unit.target: Generato quando il sintetizzatore termina un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> operazione.

trans-unit.source: If your application does not need to perform tasks while speaking, you can use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> methods or the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> method to generate speech synchronously.
trans-unit.target: Se l'applicazione non è necessario eseguire attività mentre si parla, è possibile utilizzare il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> metodi o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> metodo per generare il riconoscimento vocale in modo sincrono.

trans-unit.source: The content to speak.
trans-unit.target: Il contenuto da leggere a voce.

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously speaks the contents of a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt" /> object.
trans-unit.target: In modo asincrono legge il contenuto di un oggetto di <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt" />.

trans-unit.source: You can cancel the asynchronous speaking of a prompt with the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsyncCancel%2A> or the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsyncCancelAll%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: È possibile annullare la pronuncia asincrona di un prompt dei comandi con il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsyncCancel%2A> o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsyncCancelAll%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: To synchronously speak the contents of a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> object, use <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Fare in modo sincrono il contenuto di un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> oggetto, usare <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> object from a string and passes the object as an argument to the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene creato un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> oggetto da una stringa e l'oggetto passato come argomento per il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> (metodo).

trans-unit.source: The content to speak.
trans-unit.target: Il contenuto da leggere a voce.

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously speaks the contents of a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder" /> object.
trans-unit.target: In modo asincrono legge il contenuto di un oggetto di <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the object that contains the content to speak.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce l'oggetto contenente il contenuto da leggere a voce.

trans-unit.source: To synchronously speak the contents of a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> object, use <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Fare in modo sincrono il contenuto di un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> oggetto, usare <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> object from a string and passes the object as an argument to the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene creato un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> oggetto da una stringa e l'oggetto passato come argomento per il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> (metodo).

trans-unit.source: The text to speak.
trans-unit.target: Testo da leggere a voce.

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously speaks the contents of a string.
trans-unit.target: In modo asincrono legge il contenuto di una stringa.

trans-unit.source: Returns the object that contains the content to speak.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce l'oggetto contenente il contenuto da leggere a voce.

trans-unit.source: To asynchronously speak a string that contains SSML markup, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Per parlare in modo asincrono una stringa contenente markup SSML, utilizzare il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: To synchronously speak the contents of a string, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Per leggere in modo sincrono il contenuto di una stringa, utilizzare il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: You can cancel the asynchronous speaking of a prompt with the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsyncCancel%2A> or the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsyncCancelAll%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: È possibile annullare la pronuncia asincrona di un prompt dei comandi con il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsyncCancel%2A> o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsyncCancelAll%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: As shown in the following example, the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> method provides the simplest means to generate speech output asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: Come illustrato nell'esempio seguente, il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> metodo fornisce i mezzi più semplici per generare il riconoscimento vocale in modo asincrono di output.

trans-unit.source: The content for which to cancel a speak operation.
trans-unit.target: Il contenuto per il quale annullare un'operazione Speak.

trans-unit.source: Cancels the asynchronous synthesis operation for a queued prompt.
trans-unit.target: Annulla l'operazione asincrona di sintesi per una richiesta in coda.

trans-unit.source: You can also use this method to cancel an asynchronous speak operation for the following:
trans-unit.target: È inoltre possibile utilizzare questo metodo per annullare asincrono parlare di operazione per gli elementi seguenti:

trans-unit.source: The contents of a <xref:System.String> specified by a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: Il contenuto di un <xref:System.String> specificato da un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> metodo.

trans-unit.source: The contents of a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> specified by a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: Il contenuto di un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> specificato da un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> metodo.

trans-unit.source: The contents of a <xref:System.String> containing SSML specified by a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Il contenuto di un <xref:System.String> contenente SSML specificato da un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: When you call <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>, System.Speech creates a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> object and populates it with the contents of the method's parameter, and returns the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> object.
trans-unit.target: Quando si chiama <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>, System. Speech crea un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> dell'oggetto e viene popolato con il contenuto del parametro del metodo e restituisce il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: If you retain a copy of the returned <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt>, you can pass it into <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsyncCancel%2A> to cancel speaking content specified in a <xref:System.String> or a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> object.
trans-unit.target: Se si mantiene una copia dell'oggetto restituito <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt>, è possibile passarlo <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsyncCancel%2A> annullare pronuncia contenuto specificato un <xref:System.String> o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Cancels all queued, asynchronous, speech synthesis operations.
trans-unit.target: Annulla tutte le operazioni asincrone di sintesi vocale in coda.

trans-unit.source: The following example show a use of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsyncCancelAll%2A> to cancel the asynchronous speaking of a prompt, so that a new prompt can be spoken.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato un utilizzo delle <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsyncCancelAll%2A> per annullare la pronuncia asincrona di un prompt dei comandi, in modo che un nuovo prompt dei comandi può essere pronunciata.

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted> event fires when a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> operation is cancelled.
trans-unit.target: Si noti che il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted> evento viene generato quando un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> operazione annullata.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> completes the speaking of a prompt.
trans-unit.target: Generato quando <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> completa la pronuncia di un prompt.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> raises the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted> event at the completion of any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> genera il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted> evento al completamento di uno qualsiasi del <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> metodi.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakCompletedEventArgs> class has no properties, and does not return data from the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakCompletedEventArgs> non dispone di proprietà di classe e non restituisce dati dal <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted> evento.

trans-unit.source: It is provided to enable application authors to write event handlers for the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: Viene fornito per consentire agli autori di applicazioni scrivere gestori eventi per il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted> evento.

trans-unit.source: Raised after the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> speaks each individual word of a prompt.
trans-unit.target: Generato dopo la pronuncia di ogni singola parola di un prompt da parte di <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> raises this event for each new word that it speaks in a prompt using any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> genera questo evento per ogni nuovo termine che parla in un prompt dei comandi utilizzando uno del <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> metodi.

trans-unit.source: For an example and more information about data associated with the event, see <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakProgressEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sui dati associati all'evento, un esempio vedere <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakProgressEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: The SSML string to speak.
trans-unit.target: Stringa SSML da leggere a voce.

trans-unit.source: Synchronously speaks a <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains SSML markup.
trans-unit.target: In modo sincrono legge un oggetto <see cref="T:System.String" /> che contiene il markup SSML.

trans-unit.source: The contents of the `textToSpeak` parameter must include a `speak` element and must conform to the [Speech Synthesis Markup Language (SSML) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201763).
trans-unit.target: Il contenuto del `textToSpeak` parametro deve includere un `speak` elemento e deve essere conforme al [vocale sintesi Markup Language (SSML) versione 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201763).

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Speech Synthesis Markup Language Reference](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0c51279e-84d2-4f73-a924-8832039abf94).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [riferimenti al linguaggio di Markup sintesi vocale](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0c51279e-84d2-4f73-a924-8832039abf94).

trans-unit.source: To asynchronously speak a string that contains SSML markup, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Per parlare in modo asincrono una stringa contenente markup SSML, utilizzare il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: You can use <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> to initiate the synchronous speaking of a string that does not contain SSML markup.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> per avviare la lettura sincrona di una stringa che contiene markup SSML.

trans-unit.source: During a call to this method, the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> can raise the following events:
trans-unit.target: Durante una chiamata a questo metodo, il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> può generare gli eventi seguenti:

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged>.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the speaking state of the synthesizer changes.
trans-unit.target: Generato quando cambia lo stato del sintetizzatore pronuncia.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the synthesizer begins generating speech.
trans-unit.target: Generato quando il sintetizzatore inizia la generazione di riconoscimento vocale.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>.

trans-unit.source: Raised each time the synthesizer reaches a letter or combination of letters that constitute a discreet sound of speech in a language.
trans-unit.target: Generato ogni volta che il sintetizzatore raggiunge una lettera o una combinazione di lettere che costituiscono un suono separato della voce in una lingua.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress>.

trans-unit.source: Raised each time the synthesizer completes speaking a word.
trans-unit.target: Generato ogni volta che il sintetizzatore completa parlare di una parola.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached>.

trans-unit.source: Raised each time spoken output requires a change in the position of the mouth or the facial muscles used to produce speech.
trans-unit.target: Generato ogni volta che l'output vocale richiede una modifica nella posizione di bocca o muscoli facciale utilizzati per produrre vocale.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the synthesizer encounters a bookmark in a prompt.
trans-unit.target: Generato quando il sintetizzatore rileva un segnalibro in un prompt dei comandi.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange>.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the speaking voice for the synthesizer changes.
trans-unit.target: Generato quando la voce per il sintetizzatore cambia.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> does not raise the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted> event while processing the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> non genera il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted> eventi durante l'elaborazione di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: The following example renders the date 1/29/2009 as a date, in month, day, year order.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente il rendering della data 1/29/2009, come data, in ordine di anno, mese, giorno.

trans-unit.source: The SMML markup to speak.
trans-unit.target: Il markup SMML da leggere a voce.

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously speaks a <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains SSML markup.
trans-unit.target: In modo asincrono legge un <see cref="T:System.String" /> che contiene il markup SSML.

trans-unit.source: The contents of the `textToSpeak` parameter must include a `speak` element and must conform to the [Speech Synthesis Markup Language (SSML) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201763).
trans-unit.target: Il contenuto del `textToSpeak` parametro deve includere un `speak` elemento e deve essere conforme al [vocale sintesi Markup Language (SSML) versione 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201763).

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Speech Synthesis Markup Language Reference](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0c51279e-84d2-4f73-a924-8832039abf94).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [riferimenti al linguaggio di Markup sintesi vocale](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0c51279e-84d2-4f73-a924-8832039abf94).

trans-unit.source: To synchronously speak a string that contains SSML markup, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Per parlare in modo sincrono una stringa contenente markup SSML, utilizzare il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: You can use <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> to initiate the asynchronous speaking of a string that does not contain SSML markup.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> per avviare la lettura asincrona di una stringa che contiene markup SSML.

trans-unit.source: During a call to this method, the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> can raise the following events:
trans-unit.target: Durante una chiamata a questo metodo, il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> può generare gli eventi seguenti:

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged>.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the speaking state of the synthesizer changes.
trans-unit.target: Generato quando cambia lo stato del sintetizzatore pronuncia.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the synthesizer begins generating speech.
trans-unit.target: Generato quando il sintetizzatore inizia la generazione di riconoscimento vocale.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>.

trans-unit.source: Raised each time the synthesizer reaches a letter or combination of letters that constitute a discreet sound of speech in a language.
trans-unit.target: Generato ogni volta che il sintetizzatore raggiunge una lettera o una combinazione di lettere che costituiscono un suono separato della voce in una lingua.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress>.

trans-unit.source: Raised each time the synthesizer completes speaking a word.
trans-unit.target: Generato ogni volta che il sintetizzatore completa parlare di una parola.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached>.

trans-unit.source: Raised each time spoken output requires a change in the position of the mouth or the facial muscles used to produce speech.
trans-unit.target: Generato ogni volta che l'output vocale richiede una modifica nella posizione di bocca o muscoli facciale utilizzati per produrre vocale.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the synthesizer encounters a bookmark in a prompt.
trans-unit.target: Generato quando il sintetizzatore rileva un segnalibro in un prompt dei comandi.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange>.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the speaking voice for the synthesizer changes.
trans-unit.target: Generato quando la voce per il sintetizzatore cambia.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted>.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the synthesizer finishes processing a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> operation.
trans-unit.target: Generato al termine dell'elaborazione al sintetizzatore un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> operazione.

trans-unit.source: If your application dos not need to perform tasks while speaking, you can use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> or the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> method to generate speech synchronously.
trans-unit.target: Se non necessario eseguire attività mentre si parla dos l'applicazione, è possibile utilizzare il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> metodo per generare il riconoscimento vocale in modo sincrono.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> begins the speaking of a prompt.
trans-unit.target: Generato quando <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> inizia a pronunciare un prompt.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> raises this event when it begins processing a prompt using any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> genera questo evento quando avvia l'elaborazione di un prompt dei comandi utilizzando uno del <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> metodi.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakStartedEventArgs> class has no properties, and does not return data from the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted> event.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakStartedEventArgs> non dispone di proprietà di classe e non restituisce dati dal <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted> evento.

trans-unit.source: It is provided to enable application authors to write event handlers for the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted> event.
trans-unit.target: Viene fornito per consentire agli autori di applicazioni scrivere gestori eventi per il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted> evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current speaking state of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene lo stato di pronuncia dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the current speaking state of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce lo stato di pronuncia corrente dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" />.

trans-unit.source: To get the new state of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> after it changes, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.State%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: Per ottenere lo stato di nuovo il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> dopo avere modificato, utilizzare il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.State%2A> proprietà del <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs> classe.

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates the state of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> before, during, and after speaking a prompt.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato lo stato del <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> prima, durante e dopo la lettura di un prompt dei comandi.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the state of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> changes.
trans-unit.target: Generato alla modifica dello stato di <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> raises this event when its speaking <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.State%2A> changes.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> genera questo evento quando la pronuncia <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.State%2A> le modifiche.

trans-unit.source: For an example and more information about data associated with the event, see <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sui dati associati all'evento, un esempio vedere <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: To pause and resume speech synthesis, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Pause%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Resume%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Per sospendere e riprendere la sintesi vocale, utilizzare il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Pause%2A> e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Resume%2A> metodi.

trans-unit.source: Raised when a viseme is reached.
trans-unit.target: Generato quando viene raggiunto un viseme.

trans-unit.source: A viseme is the basic position of the mouth and face when pronouncing a phoneme.
trans-unit.target: Un viseme è la posizione di base della bocca e faccia mentre un fonema si.

trans-unit.source: Visemes are visual representations of phonemes.
trans-unit.target: Visemes sono rappresentazioni visive delle fonemi.

trans-unit.source: System.Speech supports 21 visemes for US English, each of which corresponds to one or more phonemes.
trans-unit.target: System. Speech supporta 21 visemes per l'inglese Americano, ognuno dei quali corrisponde a uno o più fonemi.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached> events are raised when a new phoneme reached has a different corresponding viseme than the previous phoneme reached.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached> gli eventi vengono generati quando un nuovo fonema raggiunto ha un diverso viseme corrispondente di fonema precedente raggiunto.

trans-unit.source: Since some visemes represent more than one phoneme, a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached> event is not generated if the next phoneme reached corresponds to the same viseme as the previous phoneme.
trans-unit.target: Poiché alcuni visemes rappresentano più fonema, un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached> evento non viene generato se il fonema successivo raggiunto corrisponde alla viseme stesso come il fonema precedente.

trans-unit.source: For example, for the spoken words "this zone", a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached> event is raised for the "s" in "this" and the "z" in "zone".
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, per le parole "questa zona", un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached> evento viene generato per la "s" in "this" e "z" in "zona".

trans-unit.source: However, a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached> event is not raised for the "z" in "zone" because it corresponds to the same viseme as the "s" in "this".
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached> non viene generato per la "z" in "zona" poiché corrisponde alla stessa viseme come la "s" in "this".

trans-unit.source: The following is a list of the 21 SAPI phonemes and phoneme groups that correspond to a viseme in US English.
trans-unit.target: Di seguito è un elenco dei gruppi fonema che corrispondono a un viseme in inglese e 21 fonemi SAPI.

trans-unit.source: For information about data associated with the `VisemeReached` event, see <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VisemeReachedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Per informazioni sui dati associati con la `VisemeReached` eventi, vedere <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VisemeReachedEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: Gets information about the current voice of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene informazioni sulla voce corrente dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns information about the current voice of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce informazioni sulla voce corrente dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" />.

trans-unit.source: When you initialize a new <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>, it uses the default system voice.
trans-unit.target: Quando si inizializza un nuovo <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>, Usa la voce di sistema predefinito.

trans-unit.source: To configure the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object to use one of the installed speech synthesis voices, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Per configurare il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> oggetto per utilizzare una delle voci di sintesi vocale installata, utilizzare il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: To get information about which voices are installed, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> method and the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> class.
trans-unit.target: Per ottenere informazioni sulle voci installate, usare il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> (metodo) e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> classe.

trans-unit.source: The following example initializes an instance of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> and gets information about the current voice.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente Inizializza un'istanza di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> e ottiene informazioni sulla voce corrente.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the voice of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> changes.
trans-unit.target: Generato alla modifica della voce di <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" />.

trans-unit.source: For an example and information about data associated with the event, see <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceChangeEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Per un esempio e informazioni sui dati associati all'evento, vedere <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceChangeEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: You can change the voice that the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> uses with any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder>'s <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.StartVoice%2A> methods or the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>'s <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: È possibile modificare la voce che il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> viene utilizzato con qualsiasi il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder>del <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.StartVoice%2A> metodi o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>del <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> metodi.

trans-unit.source: Get or sets the output volume of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il volume di output dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the volume of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" />, from 0 through 100.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce il volume di <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" />, da 0 a 100.

trans-unit.source: The following example sets the volume of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>'s audio output for the synthesized voice and the WAV file.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente imposta il volume del <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>dell'output audio di sintesi vocale e del file WAV.
